info.name: Dabble – Minimal Nighttime
info.description: This is a simple theme I wrote for Dabble after finding out that the dark theme won't be coming for some time.  There may be some things here and there that aren't themed (properly), but hopefully, everything will be themed as time goes on. I hope you all enjoy this!
info.additionalInfo:
For the theme to look exactly as it does on my screen, you need to use Windows' UI font, Segoe UI, as your sans-serif font, or its open-source equivalent, Selawik, in your browser settings, and you need to have the Quicksand font installed, which you can find over here at Font Squirrel. Otherwise, the theme will default to your default sans-serif font for the main font—usually Arial—and either the "Ubuntu" font (on Linux machines) or your default serif font—usually Times New Roman—for titles. Changelog
  • Version 0.1.0: First public release of the theme. Most things have been themed, but there may be some visual problems.
